remarks: Lemma for ~ coemul and ~ dgrmul .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
coefv0.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
coeadd.2 $e |- B = ( coeff ` G ) $.
coeadd.3 $e |- M = ( deg ` F ) $.
coeadd.4 $e |- N = ( deg ` G ) $.
coemullem $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( ( coeff ` ( F oF x. G ) ) = ( n e. NN0 |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... n ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( B ` ( n - k ) ) ) ) /\ ( deg ` ( F oF x. G ) ) <_ ( M + N ) ) ) $.
$d A k n $.
$d B k n $.
$d F k n $.
$d G k n $.
$d M k $.
$d N k n $.
$d S k n $.
